nodes.text: Lao-mon sliders were one of the speciality sliders on the menu at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. They were inspired by the planet Lao-mon and its native species the Shi'ido's ability to take on any humanoid form, to reflect this customers named the ingredients they wanted on their slider and Dexter Jettster or one of his staff would make it for them so, as the menu put it, the slider can take 'any form'. It cost 7.7 credits.
